column4: I can't select any option in compiz, though I have effects set on normal... How can I get this to work again ? :\
is your video card online?
I geuss ? how do you mean online
as in, when you run "glxgears" - what's the frame rate?  Run it from a terminal, it will tell you.
When should I stop glxgears ?
after it prints out a "frames per second" on the terminal.... and then tell us what that number is.
Highest one is 433.542, it did multiple cause I left it running
kill them all, then run ONE by itself.
i just typed glxgears and every 5 seconds it gave me an output

OK.  So- the number is less than 1000, which means you are not using a graphics card and thus your card is not "online" (graphics cards do from 2000 to LOTS MORE.  And that's why compiz won't work- it needs some callins to the graphichs card hardware.
Compiz has worked before I think, but how do I get my card online ?
Also you should know its not the best graphics card
Some animations are working though
Well, somehow, you disabled the driver for your card.  Maybe an uninstall/reinstall.  (it doesn't take much for Compiz.  I know the Intel chipset works fine).
Actually I think the drivers arent yet installed
OK, try installing the drivers.  :)
Where can I find graphic card information and current driver information ?
Depends on the card.  But- Google is your friend! :)
Erm, sorry to bother you again But I found out I have an ATI radeon xpress200 but the site of ATI driver download only goes too express 300
Well, try the flglx (spelling?) Ubuntu driver then.
http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=7129674&postcount=8 :\
I still find it strange, cause I used the options on compiz just yesterday
